name: Club el Maco
description: Escape the hustle of the city and step into a unique countryside retreat where great music, delicious food, and unforgettable moments with friends await. Nestled in the heart of nature, our rustic bar offers the perfect blend of relaxation, entertainment, and lively gatherings, making every visit a celebration.
notes: Discover the beauty of our land. Contact number +57 320 3755982

name: Birdwatching
description: Get to know our bird diversity by observing it on the trails where you can find high mountain birds from the Colombian Massif and present on a small, organic coffee farm.
notes: Discover the beauty of our land. Contact number +57 312 4762181

name: TierrActiva
description: The preparation of healthy bread and cakes with traditional flours from the region (chachafruto, arracacha, wheat, corn, Achira starch, yuca, bore), and other ingredients such as nutritious seeds like quinoa, chia, oats and flaxseed, will truly be another experience to share, enjoy and taste with a good cup of organic, aromatic coffee or wine.
notes: You can do many activities, contact number +57 312 4762181

name: El Maco
description: Indulge in a dining experience where flavors come to life. Our restaurant blends fresh, high-quality ingredients with a warm and inviting atmosphere, making it the perfect place to enjoy a delicious meal with family and friends.
notes: Discover the beauty of our land. Contact number +57 320 3755982
